text: hey everyone my name is Harrison Chase
CEO and co-founder of Lang chain welcome
to this YouTube series on Lang chain 0.1
linkchain has been around for a little
over a year at this point and it's grown
tremendously in that time span as we've
grown we've wanted to make linkchain
more stable and more production ready
and we've taken the opportunity of 0.1
to do exactly that we've
rearchitecturing
to allow for better versioning and to
make it more
stable we've also talked with a lot of
folks in the community to figure out
what they love about Lang chain and
we've decided to focus Lang chain on
those core areas which will be the
subjects of the next videos part of each
video is conceptual going over the
concept that we think is important and
then part of it is actually running the
code so you get a hands-on experience
with Lang chain we hope you enjoy
